author: CBS News
title: Weak, apparently virus-positive immigrant forced to call hearing
description: "I can barely walk," he said. Guard said he was too weak to talk. Louisiana hearing lasted two hours.
content:
A detained immigrant who said he tested positive for COVID-19 was required to call in for a court hearing even after a guard said he was too weak to talk, his attorney said Thursday.
When the judge asked Salomon Diego Alonzo to say his name, the guard respon… [+4388 chars]
